item.title: HardWiredVsMicroProgrammed;
item.description: Intro Describes a “big Picture” of computer systems through an example of a “simple” computer. This computer is Big Endian (reads the leftmost (most significant) bit first) The Basic Computer Two Principal functional parts Data path section where processing occurs Control section decodes instructions and leaves control sequence for Data path section Two types of control units Hard wired controllers Micro programmed controllers figure 1 Description of figure 1 Data Path Sections
